availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: W W Helm (Newport, Campbell County, Kentucky, resident and farmer)

body.p: Newport, Campbell County, Kentucky, resident and farmer. Kentucky native. Son of F. T. Helm and Sarah B. Helm. Resident in Campbell County, Kentucky in 1850. Farmer in Campbell County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Campbell County, Newport, p. 44A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Campbell County, Jamestown District, p. 683.
